title: Compare integration patterns: opt-in vs opt-out, required vs optional, graceful degradation strategies. Survey similar tools (Git, Docker, package managers).
description:
Empirica Subtask 7a2138e2
Parent Goal: 5d43301e
close_reason: Compared: Git LFS, npm, Python extras all use opt-in for external deps. Pre-commit (opt-out) only works because no external deps.

title: Build and distribute v1.0.5 package
close_reason: v1.0.5 package built and ready for distribution - 662KB wheel, 601KB tar.gz

title: Analyze current BEADS adoption: 5/104 goals linked (4.8%). Why so low? Manual opt-in burden? Lack of awareness? Integration complexity?
description:
Empirica Subtask 1877e1fb

close_reason: Analyzed: 4.8% adoption due to manual opt-in burden and lack of documentation/hints

title: If default: how to migrate 99 existing unlinked goals? Batch script? Manual review? Opt-out flag for users who don't want BEADS?
description:
Empirica Subtask 939030d0
Parent Goal: 5d43301e
close_reason: Migration: Not needed. Keep opt-in, add per-project config option (default_use_beads in project settings).

title: What breaks if BEADS is default? Fresh installs without bd CLI? Multi-repo projects? CI/CD pipelines? API-only usage?
description:
Empirica Subtask 5e66a728
Parent Goal: 5d43301e
close_reason: Identified: Making default breaks CI/CD, creates silent inconsistencies, forces annoying opt-out flags. All worse than opt-in.

title: check command rejects valid AI-first JSON with unclear error message
close_reason: False alarm - 'check' command already supports AI-first JSON stdin. check-submit is legacy flag-based only. Documentation should clarify to use 'empirica check -'

title: CLI Audit: Review 16 failing commands and remove legacy/unnecessary ones
close_reason: Completed: Removed 16 non-functional CLI command stubs. All were intentionally empty parser functions marked as deprecated or not-yet-implemented. CLI now has 54 total commands with 38 working (70% pass rate vs 38/54 before = same working commands, just removed broken stubs). Commands removed: assess, self-awareness, metacognitive, calibration, uvl, decision, decision-batch, feedback, profile-*, list, explain, demo, bootstrap. Superseded by: preflight-submit, check, postflight-submit, project-bootstrap.

title: Fix flow_metrics slice error in project-bootstrap
description: Bootstrap fails at 'Flow State Analysis' with 'slice(None, 5, None)' error. Issue is in project_commands.py line ~688 where flow_data[:5] is used. Need to check what breadcrumbs['flow_metrics'] actually returns and handle it correctly.

title: Add flow_state to project-bootstrap JSON output
description: Flow state is calculated and shown in human output (88.2/100) but missing from --output json. Need to add flow_state object to breadcrumbs dict before JSON serialization. Location: empirica/cli/command_handlers/project_commands.py bootstrap handler

title: Add epistemic artifacts guidance to system prompts
description: System prompts need comprehensive section on WHEN to create findings/unknowns/dead_ends/mistakes. Current mentions are brief. Need detailed guidance with examples showing patterns for artifact creation. Applies to all AI system prompts (Mistral, Claude, Qwen, Gemini)

title: Add epistemic_health to project-bootstrap JSON output
description: Health score is calculated and shown in human output (88.0/100) but missing from --output json. Need to add epistemic_health object to breadcrumbs dict before JSON serialization. Location: empirica/cli/command_handlers/project_commands.py bootstrap handler

title: Verify session count accuracy in project-bootstrap
description: Bootstrap shows 'Total sessions: 1' but project should have multiple sessions. May indicate query filtering issue or missing session records. Location: empirica/data/session_database.py bootstrap_project_breadcrumbs() method - check total_sessions count query
